review_details: Very nice and lovely people and excellent trip!! I visit for second time strait year and its been one of the best thinks i do in my vocation. Thnx Guys, love you

A unique expirience!! We eat the most fresh fish on lixouri. the food was cooked greek way and was excelent. the hospitality was grate and the cruise amazing.we had also music and wine. we do this cruize with my family twice! trust me and do it!!
PETANI MEANS THE PLACE YOUR MIND FLY IN GREEK.!! One of the paradise beaches in Kefalonia! feel free your mind , enjoy the crystal waters.
Best night club in town at front of the sea! really good coffe and cocktails. thnk you guys, see you next time
Best resturant in town. the people are really nice and the food is the best. love to try meatpie and chiken with spaggeti
Its our home every afternoon! the only place to find good billiards in town. the beer and club sandwich its exacly what i expected. really good
One of the best thinks to do on Lixouri! It was amazing! Thnk you guys best views, music , food with no cost
